p: National Public Health Laboratory being only one diagnosis center for influenza infection in Nepal during 2016, patients from all over Nepal were referred to NPHL. We recorded total patients from 63 districts of the country. However, positive cases for influenza infection were confirmed from 44 districts only. The highest number of case was recorded from Kathmandu district which alone comprised of about near to half of the cases (40.6%). Other districts like Lalitpur, Bhaktapur, Dhading and Nuwakot also had higher number of cases ( FigureÂ 2).
